text: <@U06DFL7BP>:  I made those copy updates this morning, but I’m still looking into the log-in-after-updating thing. It’s reproduced, just haven’t narrowed it down fully yet. My initial thought is it’s because of a model update.
awesome, thanks <@U0261PCRQ>!

<@U06DFL7BP>:  I actually have to take back what I said. When I thought I had reproduced the issue, I was actually installing a different build flavor (basically a different version of the same app) and in that version I was not logged in. Going to try a few more tests to reproduce, but right now, I actually haven’t.
hmmmmkay
have we tried just the previous play store tag vs the last release?
wondering if last release -> dev might not repro
I just tested with the last release and most recent release. Going to try again with  the last release and then pulling the latest from the play store.
do you know if this is on Android or if it was a fire phone issue?
I’m currently testing on android, but wonder if it might be specific to fire phone
i don’t, i can ask – my presumption would be fire phone
k, I’ll test that in a couple minutes

so, I tried installing amazon v10 then amazon v11 on the firephone and could not recreate the issue. Tried installing v10 and then updating from the amazon store, but I was not given the option to update, only open, the app.
hmmm
I suspect that most of the users at Amazon are iphone users, could it be an iOS issue?
asked him to verify the list where I marked it ‘android only’ to confirm but anything’s possible :wink: i’ll ask
<@U02618EV1|gaston> has left the channel
possible they were on dev version then updated to play store version and that caused them to have to log in again
the dev version and production versions have different signatures, so they could have both versions on their device, they won’t overwrite each other
it’s possible they didn’t have the production version before installing from the play store and that could cause some confusion
are they savvy enough to know that
probably not
yeah i think we’re headed in the same direction
they had dev, installed play store, had to log in again
but there’s a line "This has caused some confusion among users…"
makes it sound like real users complained about it
or their internal users :wink:
either way – hit up Taylor
